body_html: @skye @asimshankar I have also finally added support for while loops, back propagation, and RNNs, by reimplementing pretty much all of the Python API functionality and adding some strong typing on top of it (with respect to loop variables, etc), and so I guess you can close this issue if you want as there isn't any remaining issue I can see. :)
body_text: @skye @asimshankar I have also finally added support for while loops, back propagation, and RNNs, by reimplementing pretty much all of the Python API functionality and adding some strong typing on top of it (with respect to loop variables, etc), and so I guess you can close this issue if you want as there isn't any remaining issue I can see. :)
body: @skye @asimshankar I have also finally added support for while loops, back propagation, and RNNs, by reimplementing pretty much all of the Python API functionality and adding some strong typing on top of it (with respect to loop variables, etc), and so I guess you can close this issue if you want as there isn't any remaining issue I can see. :)
